casebody.data:
Sammy JOHNSON and Vici Johnson
v.
COLONIAL LIFE & ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY, Paul Clifton and Fred Raab. No. 635P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. John L. Sarratt, Ann M. Anderson, Raleigh, for Insurance Company. Jeffrey E. Oleynik, Greensboro, Marvin K. Blount, Jr., Rebecca C. Blount, Harry H. Albritton, Jr., Greenville, for Sammy & Vici Johnson.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 14th day of November 2005 by Defendant (Colonial Life & Accident Insurance Co.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
